text: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
author: Galadriel

text: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
author: Gandalf

text: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: Bilbo Baggins

text: There’s some good in this world, Mr. Frodo. And it’s worth fighting for.
author: Samwise Gamgee

text: I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.
author: Arwen

text: One does not simply walk into Mordor.
author: Boromir

text: The world is indeed full of peril and in it there are many dark places.
author: Haldir

text: Deeds will not be less valiant because they are unpraised.
author: Aragorn

text: You shall not pass!
author: Gandalf

text: I am no man!
author: Éowyn

text: A day may come when the courage of men fails, but it is not this day.
author: Aragorn

text: There’s no going back. We only have to keep moving forward.
author: Samwise Gamgee

text: The ring has awoken, it’s heard its master’s call.
author: Gandalf

text: I wish the ring had never come to me. I wish none of this had happened.
author: Frodo Baggins

text: So do all who live to see such times, but that is not for them to decide.
author: Gandalf

text: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
author: Gimli

text: The board is set, the pieces are moving.
author: Gandalf

text: There is no curse in Elvish, Entish, or the tongues of Men for this treachery.
author: Treebeard

text: I will take the Ring, though I do not know the way.
author: Frodo Baggins

text: It’s a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door.
author: Bilbo Baggins

text: You have my sword. And you have my bow. And my axe.
author: Aragorn, Legolas, Gimli

text: I can’t carry it for you, but I can carry you.
author: Samwise Gamgee

text: The time of the Elves is over. My people are leaving these shores.
author: Elrond

text: I would have followed you, my brother... my captain... my king.
author: Boromir

text: There is always hope.
author: Aragorn

text: The road goes ever on and on, down from the door where it began.
author: Bilbo Baggins

text: I will not say: do not weep; for not all tears are an evil.
author: Gandalf

text: Courage is found in unlikely places.
author: Gildor Inglorion

text: The shadow does not hold sway yet.
author: Aragorn

text: You step into the Road, and if you don't keep your feet, there is no knowing where you might be swept off to.
author: Bilbo Baggins

text: Oft hope is born when all is forlorn.
author: Legolas

text: The wide world is all about you: you can fence yourselves in, but you cannot forever fence it out.
author: Gildor Inglorion

text: May it be a light to you in dark places, when all other lights go out.
author: Galadriel

text: Go where you must go, and hope!
author: Gandalf

text: A single leaf turns the fate of the forest.
author: Legolas

text: In silence, the mountains remember every footstep.
author: Gimli

text: Even shadows must give way when the dawn arrives.
author: Arwen

text: Bravery is not the absence of fear, but the choice to face it.
author: Frodo Baggins

text: Songs of old echo loudest in the hearts of the young.
author: Samwise Gamgee
